Package com.aevi.helpers

This package provides helper classes and an overview of the available permissions.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BundleHelper
    Helper class for TransactionResult and the various request classes (i.e.
    BundleWrapper
    Base class Bundle value holder.
    HexUtils
    Helper methods to convert a byte array into readable hexadecimal string.
    ImageUtil
    Utility class for providing some generic image processing and compression
    Permissions
    Permission groups and definitions of the Aevi Device.
    Permissions.PaymentGroup
    Payment permissions
    Permissions.ServicesGroup
    Services permissions
    SdkLibrary  
    StatusRemoteServiceError  
    StringUtils
    StringUtils is a util class containing helpful String methods
    Version
    A utility class used to determine SDK version compatibility
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ApiStatus  
    ServiceState
    Used by TerminalConfiguration and PaymentAppConfiguration.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CompatibilityException
    This exception is thrown when there are incompatibility issues between installed terminal services version and the application SDK version
    ProviderNotAvailableException
    Exception that is thrown if the provider for the requested information is not available.

Package com.aevi.helpers Description

This package provides helper classes and an overview of the available permissions.
